import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./decision-description.css" const DecisionDescription = (props) => { const [typeDecision, settypeDecision] = useState("Institutional LMS"); const handletypeDecision = (e) => { settypeDecision(e.target.value); }; const [institution, setInstitution] = useState("moodle"); const handleInstitution = (e) => { setInstitution(e.target.value); }; const displayDetails = () => { switch (typeDecision) { case "Institutional LMS": return ( ); default: return ( ); } }; return (

); }; export default DecisionDescription;
